alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Stark (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 9:22PM EDT until July 20 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Stark County in northeastern Ohio... Eastern Holmes County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 1015 PM EDT. * At 921 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Winesburg, or 11 miles east of Millersburg, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Berlin, Walnut Creek, Brewster, Navarre, Waynesburg, East Sparta, Wilmot, Winesburg, Farmerstown, Beach City, Baltic, Charm and Mount Hope. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
